resources.string: \"I always seem to get the bad end of the deal.\"
Once per turn: Give a card from your hand to your next teammate.
\"Here my friend, it is the best I have to offer.\"
Once per game: Discard all Spades you own and end your turn: All Spades controlled by your next opponent are discarded; You may not be attacked until the end of your next turn.
Once per turn: Pay 4 points: Declare a suit; Discard the top card of the deck until a card of the declared suit is discarded or the deck runs out; Add the top card of the discard pile to your hand.
\"You must dig for your deepest desires.\"
During your Standby Phase: Gain 1 point for every 2 cards in your hand.
\"There is nothing to gain from holding back. On the contrary…\"
During your Draw Phase: If you control fewer than 2 Hearts, draw 1 card.
Twice per turn: Discard 2 Clubs: Draw 3 cards; Your Last Club is treated as the total value of the discarded Clubs.
\"Few have discovered the power of raising the Club.\"
When you play a Club: You may play any number of cards whose total value is less than or equal to the value of the Club.
If the defender controls 2 or more Diamonds, your bypass attack power is 75%.
\"Even when you are strong, you are weak.\"
During your Draw Phase: If you hold 5 or more cards, do not draw; Otherwise, draw until you hold 5 cards.
Twice per turn: Discard 1 card: Discard the top card of the deck; If the deck card has a lower value than the card from your hand, draw 2 cards.
\"Does it pay off? As long as there are cards to count.\"
The costs of Utility Cards you hold are reduced by 1.
\"That\'s my final offer. I won\'t pay a cent more.\"
The values of Hearts you control are increased by 1.
\"An apple a day keeps the bypass away.\"
Pay 4 points: Draw 1 card; If it is a Heart, you may immediately play it for free.
\"I trust in the Heart of the Deck.\"
Once per turn: Pay 4 points: Play a Utility Card for free; You may not play any more cards this turn.
\"I am only asking for a small loan. I promise I will pay you back in full…\"
During your Standby Phase: Gain 2 points for each Diamond and Spade you control.
\"Natural Diamonds are always increasing in value.\"
Your full hand is 12 cards. During your Draw Phase: Draw 1 card for every 4 cards in your hand.
\"If they want it, they\'ll have to get it from me.\"
While you only control 1 Heart, you cannot be bypassed.
Pay 12 points: Draw until you have a full hand; You may not play any more cards this turn.
Once per turn: Pay 3 points: Draw 1 card; Place a card from your hand on the top of the deck.
Pay 3 points: Return a card you control to your hand: Play a card of the same suit for free that costs up to 3 points more.
\"We must do away with the old to make space for the new.\"
Skip your Draw Phase: Gain 6 points during your Standby Phase.
Thrice per turn: Discard a Spade: Draw 1 card.
\"They don\'t need my help. They will destroy themselves.\"
Once per turn: Pay 4 points: Discard 1 card: All cards on a board with a base value equal to the discarded card\'s base value are discarded.
\"I used to think I was cursed.\"
Once per turn: Discard all the cards in your hand: Draw 1 card for each discarded; Shuffle the discard pile into the deck.
\"I must cleanse myself often, lest I am rendered useless.\"
The values of Clubs you play are increased by 2.
The top card of the deck is visible to you.
Once per turn: Discard up to 3 Utility Cards: Gain points equal to half the cards\' total value; Draw 1 card for every 2 discarded.
All Clubs you play allow you to draw 2 cards.
\"It would be much simpler if it were all the same.\"
The values of Diamonds you control are increased by 1.
Once per turn: Discard 1 card: Draw 2 cards; Discard 1 card.
\"He always seems to get the good end of the deal.\"
During your Standby Phase: Gain 3 points.
The values of Spades you control are increased by 1.
